Step 1: Heat the cooking potthen brown the pork belly
Step 2: Add the onions and garlic and cook until the onions are soft
Step 3: Put-in the soy sauce, peppercorn, bay leaves
Step 4: Pour-in the pineapple juice and let boil. Simmer until the pork is tender (add water as needed)

ingredients.p: * 1 wholw pig's leg (pata; about 3 to 4 lbs), cleaned

procedure.p: Step 1: Pour water in a cooking pot then let boil
Step 2: Put-in dried bay leaves, whole peppercorn, star anise, and 4 teaspoons of salt
Step 3: Add the whole pig's leg in the cooking pot then simmer until the leg becomes tender (about 45 to 60 minutes)
Step 4: Remove the tender leg from the cooking pot and set aside until the temperature goes down
Step 5: Rub the leg with garlic powder, ground black pepper, and remaining salt. Let stand for 15 minutes to absorb the rub
Step 6: Heat a clean large cooking pot (preferably with cover) and pour-n the cooking oil

Step 7: When the oil becomes hot, deep fry the rubbed pork leg. Continue cooking in medium heat until one side becomes crispy, and then cautiously flip the leg to crisp the other side. Note: Be extra careful in doing this procedure.
Step 8: Turn-off the heat; remove the crispy pork leg; and transfer it to a wide serving plate.

ingredients.p: * 3 tbsp chicken drippings (you get this when you rest the chicken, don't use the one from the bottom of the pot)

procedure.p: Step 1: Generously rub chicken with salt, garlic and fresly ground black pepper inside the cavity and outside
Step 2: Stuff the cavity with onions, lemon grass, garlic and ginger

Step 3: Place 3 cups of rock salt in the bottom of an earthenware pot then line the top with banana leaves. Place chicken in a sitting position then place in an open flame over stove or fire burner, make sure the rest of the chicken would not touch the sides of the pot. Cook for 2 to 2 1/2 hours or until chicken is tender
Step 4: Once cooked, place chicken in a wire rock to cool, let the juice run in a container
Step 5: Place all sauce ingredients together in a sauce pan and simmer in low heat for 5 minutes
Step 6: Place chicken in a serving plate then serve with dipping sauce.

procedure.p: Step 1: Cut the chichen into pieces. Leave the chicken bone in. If you prepare bone chicken meat,then de-bone the chicken
Step 2: Heat up the a deep pot and add the oil
Step 3: Fried the potato and carrot for 2 mins and set asider
Step 4: Saute chicken together with garlic, onion and ginger
Step 5: When garlic is lighjt brown in color add fish sause and curry power
Step 6: Stire well then add water then cover the pot and lower the heat to mideum and simmer until the chicken is tender
Step 7: Once the chicken is cooked, add the red bell pepper, ciliry, carrot and potato then simmer for 5 minutes.
Step 8: Add the coconut milk and mix well.Simmer for another 5 minutes
Step 9: Serve hot with rice.

ingredients.p: * 2 medium size potatoes, peeled and quartered(can be smaller)
* 2 medium size carrot, peeled cut into one size
* 1 red bell pepper, cut into approx 1 square inch
* 3/4 cup evaporated milk(or fresh milk, but better result with evap)

procedure.p: Step 1: Chop the chicken into samll pieces
Step 2: Heat a medium dutch oven (or any pan you prapare). When its hot, put olive oil and heat it up, saute garlic until golden brown, add the onion until it become transparent
Step 3: Add the chicken and saute for about a minutes, then add patis(add depending on your taste). Mix then add pepper and pickles. Simmer then cover. Juices will start to come out
Step 4: Wait until chicken is half cooked then add the pineapple chunks including the syrup.
Step 5:When the chicken is cooked, add carrots and potatoes.Simmer until the vegetables are cooked
Step 6: Add bell pepper, then stir and bring back to boil.
Step 7: Add the milk then cheese until melted.

ingredients.p: * 1 pc Red Chili (Siling Haba) seeded thinly sliced
* Green Onion or Scallions(Dahon sibuyas) for garnish(optional)

procedure.p: Step 1: In a large wok, add canola oil then saute onion, garlic, ginger, and chicken for 8 to 10 minutes
Step 2: Add pepper, peppercorns, bayleaf and Siling haba(red chili) then saute for another 2 minutes
Step 3: Now add the vinegar, water, and soy sauce then bring to the boil.
Step 4: Simmer for 5 minutes, add salt to taste.
Step 5:Garnish with green onions then Serve hot with rice.

ingredients.p: * 1/2 kilo beef chucks, cut into large cube
* 1 thumb size ginger, cut into slivers
* 1 small size red bell pepper, cut into strips

procedure.p: Step 1: In a sauce pan put beef, pour water to cover, bring to a boil and simmmer for a minutes.
Step 2: Now drain first boiled water and rinse off all scum.Return beef in the sauce pan por fresh water to cover, add in garlic, ginger, onion, star anise and soy sauce.
Step 3: Bring to a boil and simmer at low to medium heat for45 to 60 minutes, add more water as necessary.
Step 4: Add sugar and hoisin sause, simmer for another 10 to minutes or until the meat are tender and almost disintegrate and the liquid has reduced to about half.
Step 5:Thicken sauce with cornstarch diluted in 1/4 cup water. Correct saltines if required. Add in the spring onion and bell pepper, cook for another half minute. Serve hot with a lot of rice.
To Marinate
Step 1: Combine in a container the following ingridients; soy sauce, garlic, salt, pepper, and sugar and mix well then set aside.
Step 2: After mixing all the ingridients place the beef in the clear plastic bag or Zoploc.
Step 3: Pour the mixed seasonings in the Ziploc with meat and mix well.
Step 4: Refrigerate the marinade for a minimum of 12 hours.
How to cook beef tapa
Step 1: In a pan, place 2 cups of of water and bring to a boil .
Step 2: Add the marinated beef tapa and cook until the water evaporates.
procedure.P: Step 3: When all the water evaporated add 3 tbsp of cooking oil in the pan then fry the tapa until done.
Step 4: Serve with rice topped with fried egg and sliced tomatoes.

ingredients.p: * 10 onces condensed cream of mushroom soup

procedure.p: Step 1: Make the mushroom gravy
Step 1.1: Heat a cooking pot or sauce pan then add the 1 tablespoon butter and melt
Step 1.2: Put-in the mushroom and saute for 3 minutes
Step 1.3: Add the condensed cream of mushroom soup then stir
Step 1.4: Pour 3/4 cup water; add 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/2 teaspoon groundblack pepper then stir. Simmer for 5 minutes or until the sauce thickens
Step 1.5: Set aside
Step 3: Pour 3 cups of water and apply heat. Let boil and simmer until the beef is tender. Remove from the cooking pot and place in a clean plate. Note: Add water as needed.
Step 4: Season both side of beef with 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, and garlic powder. Set aside.
Step 5: Heat a pan then add 2 tablespoons butter. Let the butter melt
Step 6: Pan-fry both sides of the beef for at least 2 minutes per side.
Step 7: Heat the sizzling plate (metal plate) then put-i 1 tablespoon butter and let melt it.
Step 8: Arrange the pan fried beef on the sizzling plate, top with mushroom gravy and place the corn on the side.
Step 1: Marinade beef in soy sauce, lemon (or calamansi), and ground black pepper for at least 1 hour
Step 2: Heat the cooking oil in a pan then stir fry the onion rings until the texture becomes soft. Set aside
Step 3: In the same pan where the onions were fried, fry the marinated beef(without the marinade) until the color turns brown. Set aside
Step 4: Put-in the garlic then saute for a few minutes
Step 5: Pour the marinade and bring to a boil
Step 6: Put in the fried beef and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes or until meat is tender. Add water as need
Step 7: Add the stir-fried onions and same salt to taste
Step 8: Serve hot.
Step 1: Wash and clean the mussels, beard removed, boil it in a pan until the shells are open
Step 2: Remove the mussels meat then in another sauce pan heat the cooking oil, saute garlic and ginger until fragrant
Step 3: Add in the mussels, peppercorn and bay leaf, stir cook for 1 to 2 minutes
Step 4: Add in vinegar, soy sauce and red chili
Step 5: Let simmer for 5 to 10 minutes or until most of the liquid has evaporated stirring occasionaly
Step 6: Garnsih with sliced onions for added flavor
Step 7: Season with salt to taste. Serve hot

procedure.p: Step 1: To extract the coconut milk, pour about 2 cups of water on a 1 kilo of shredded coconut
Step 2: On a caserolr, put coconut milk with the other ingredients such as garlic, ginger, onion, shrimp paste. fish sauce or salt and bring to a boil until the coconut milk become thick
Step 3: When boiling, pour the snail (suso) and boil again
Step 4: Next step is to add the papaya and moringa/malunggay leaves
Step 5: If you like it hot, put few chopped hot chilli. Don't overcooked the papaya.
Step 6: Serve hot. Share and Enjoy!
